body:
Hey...

 So my IGN is BlueFurry705
This server goes WAYYYYY BACK. This server is the first server i ever joined when i start playing on multiplayer. This server is where all my PVP started and helped. Back then i played alot on this server. Now im just getting back into playing. I just found out the server had a forums page and I made an account and here i am introducing myself. I am not noob at PVP so be prepared to be rekt :)
See you on the server!
